Articles.Content: Just noticed they've added women's styles. Thanks guys! Flag planting shirt now on its way to me. Awesome :-)
Can't seem to find the ones you speak of. Searched "kerbal" and found only Jeb shirts and Kerbal Comics shirts. Searched "ksp" and got lots of unrelated stuff. Any links please?

Oh, man. Saw this. Bought stuff.

Gonna get subjected to wife-rage.
Awesome! Thanks for the link. I needed a new mouse pad anyhow, might as well get some other stuff to save on shipping, eh?

I bought a KSP t-shirt from Cafe Press a little while ago and it was absolutely terrible quality. I mean terrible. The shirt is so thin you can see right through it when wearing it. Don't think it'll survive more than 10 washes, if that.

It's a shame you can't get t-shirts somewhere else.
